TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IContributeDynamicSink

Docs.summary: Indicates that the implementing property will be registered at runtime through the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.Context.RegisterDynamicProperty%2A> method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Dynamic properties can contribute sinks that are notified when remoting calls start and finish.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.IDynamicMessageSink GetDynamicSink() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns the message sink that will be notified of call start and finish events through the interface.
Docs.returns: A dynamic sink that exposes the interface.
